document.full_text: british trio ian poulter, paul casey and luke donald were critical of the ernie els-inspired redesign of the west course at wentworth on friday.
document.title: poulter, casey, donald critical of new-look wentworth
lines_and_colors: british trio ian poulter, paul casey and luke donald were critical of the ernie els-inspired redesign of the west course at wentworth on friday.
